retrospective.summary: Added activity verification to injectTask() in relay-pty-orchestrator.ts. After socket confirms delivery, verifies CLI shows activity (task received patterns, thinking spinners, tool execution) within 5s. Retries up to 3 times if no activity detected. Prevents T-003-style failures where PTY delivery succeeded but CLI wasn't ready.
